CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and is currently serving a prison sentence at Penitentiary No . CARDINAL in GPE ( see in the latter respect PERSON v. GPE ( dec . ) , no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , DATE ) .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant had a serious accident at work in ORG ( a ORG - owned enterprise , hereafter the “ ORG ” ) .

CARDINAL . DATE , in DATE , the ORG decided to pay the applicant a lump sum in compensation for the injury . However , no payment was made and in DATE the applicant sued the ORG for compensation for the industrial injury . On DATE ORG of Donetsk found for the applicant and awarded him UAH CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL . No appeal was lodged against the judgment and it became final DATE , on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( hereafter “ the Bailiffs’ Service ” ) instituted proceedings to enforce the judgment of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG instituted bankruptcy proceedings against the ORG and issued an injunction barring the debt recovery .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG stayed the execution proceedings against the Company pending the resolution of the bankruptcy case .

CARDINAL . In letters of DATE and CARDINAL and DATE ORG informed the applicant that the enforcement proceedings were impeded by ongoing bankruptcy litigation and the entry into force of the DATE PERSON on the LAW of a Moratorium on the Forced Sale of Property which barred the attachment and sale of the ORG ’s capital assets .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG discontinued the bankruptcy proceedings against the ORG and , accordingly , ORG resumed the execution proceedings in the applicant ’s case . However , it appears that the gradual enforcement of the judgment of DATE continued even during the period when the proceedings were formally suspended , as by DATE ( when the case was communicated to the Government for observations ) the applicant had been paid a total of UAH CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL in several instalments , including UAH CARDINAL on DATE and UAH CARDINAL on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE the applicant was repaid the remainder of the amount awarded by the judgment of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG terminated the enforcement proceedings as the judgment in the applicant ’s favour had been enforced in full .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
